PositiveSyntaxTest.purpose: Test that safe formulas are accepted. Note that this ruleset does not have finite models, and is not strongly safe.

InputDocument.Presentation: Document( Prefix(ex <http://example.org/example#>) Prefix(func <http://www.w3.org/2007/rif-builtin-function#>) Group( ex:p(0) Forall ?x (ex:p(External(func:numeric-add(?x 1))) :- ex:p(?x)) ) )
